user.title: Goal Zero Yeti
user.description:
First, you need to download the Goal Zero app: https://www.goalzero.com/product-features/yeti-app/

Follow the instructions to connect your Yeti to your Wi-fi network. DHCP reservation on your router is recommended. If not set up, the device may become unavailable until Home Assistant detects the new ip address. Refer to your router's user manual.
